ygData.subject: Re: Back in Action
ygData.msgSnippet: ... small ... long ... his ... coward? Your the one still a gestalt you wimp! Kracken yells. Grenade is struck by the optic blasts. Ahhhh! The hell?

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

> Oblitertron/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Serpentor/Nemesis
> Enforcer/Scattershot/Chaos/Minion/Sixshot/Ares/Unitron:
>
>
>
> Oblitertron let out a roar of anger as he saw Mobster disassemble into
small
> parts.  "COWARD!" he bellowed, firing off three optic blasts solely at
> Grenade. He would crush these pathetic ants, one by one.  No matter how
long
> it took.  The behemoth burst out into laughter as autogun fire stung into
his
> back.

"coward? Your the one still a gestalt you wimp!" Kracken yells. Grenade is
struck by the optic blasts.

"Ahhhh! The hell?" Grenade says. Serge fires 2 missiles from each shoulder
cannon (The dinosaur arms) at Oblitertron.


> Dark Claw, still in his "vehicle" mode, firing off two missiles, one from
> each missile launcher installed in his vehicle mode, at the Mafia base.

The Mafia base is struck and an alarm goes off. It blares as the remianing
autoguns open fire on Dark Claw.

> Chaos fired off ten rapid optic blasts at the Mafia base.

The Mafia base is hit harder and fires yet more at Dark Claw.

> Minion fired took out his automatic rifle, firing off twenty-five
explosive
> shells at the Mafia base.

The explosive shells exploded on the base.

"A tough base like this will last for a while I hope." Deemos says. He
decides to come out to the battle. He comes around the side and fires at
Oblitertron with 2 missiles.

> Unitron, still in tank mode, targeted with his cannon, firing off a single
> blast at Kracken.

Kracken raises his blaster, but is hitm by the missile and falls over. He
aims carefully and fires 4 times at Unitron.

> Sixshot gained altitude, getting a target lock, and firing off two seeking
> missiles down at Gigas.

Gigas aims at the missiles, and fires, destroying one. He remains immobile
and the other missile hits him, it explodes. He still stands, but is now a
very nice black color with alot of scratches.

"Ow. You are now going to die, for I will destroy you." Gigas says slowly.
He fires back rapidly 15 times at SixShot.


> Serpentor looked at the Alliance bot who had told him to join the battle.
> "Fine." he said, rubbing his mech-fluid soaked face from the shrapnel of
the
> exploding Diskus.  He ran off for the Mafia base.
>
> "We're to injured." Scattershot said, taking out a charge and setting it
in
> the middle of the pieces of Diskus, the bomb set for 20 seconds.

Diskus's leg burrowed under ground completely and starrts to move back to
base. There was a homing beacon inside of it and it moved rapidly toward the
base, being drawn towards it. The bomb explodes and destroys all of the
pieces except for the leg that failed to be noticed. Burning Hammer looked
at the fire.

"Something is not right here." Burning Hammer says. He moves away from the
fire as it grows.
